divs: Sighting Detailssix fast moving points of light around avery black dot.was witnessed by me and several bus riders,and one security guard.visable over downtown dayton,almost due north.i was waiting ffor the10:30 pm bus,and for some reason i just looked up.inoticed these litesand said to theguard do you see what isee?he said yes,and we pointed up and servral others saw them to.i first thougrt they came from the infameous skunk works ,it being the day after 9 11.i was a little awed,but living near wright-patt you never know what you'llsee.i lost sight after i got on the bus.i wathed it for a good teen min.s
